From: (USANYE)"  
To: ' (USANYS)" czi 
Cc: 
(USANYS)"  
fr" 
Subject: RE: Johnny Contreras —  Investigation of 
Jeffrey 
Epstein Death 
Date: Wed, 21 Aug 2019 20:17:07 +0000 
You're all set! Good luck. And please just keep me posted, since I'm going to be stuck writing his Capital Case memo this 
fall! 
From: 
(USANYS) ,ct> 
Sent: Tuesday, August 20, 2019 4:59 PM 
To: (USANYE) <> 
Cc: (USANYS)
Subject: RE: Johnny Contreras — Investigation of Jeffrey Epstein Death 
Thanks! If you're good with it, we'll reach out, copying you, to set up a  proffer within the next week or so. Copying
who's also working on this. 
From: (USANYE) a> 
Sent: Tuesday, August 20, 2019 4:46 PM 
To: (USANYS) 
Subject: RE: Johnny Contreras — Investigation of Jeffrey Epstein Death 
The attorney proffer from Andy Patel was today (08/20) at approx. 3:30 pm, just FYI. 
From: (USANYE) 
Sent: Tuesday, August 20, 2019 4:34 PM 
To: (USANYS) 
Subject: FW: Johnny Contreras — Investigation of Jeffrey Epstein Death 
From: Andrew Patel 
Sent: Monday, August 12, 2019 3:15 PM 
To: (USANYE) 
(USANYE) <> 
Cc: Donald Yannella
Andrew Patel 
Subject: Johnny Contreras — Investigation of Jeffrey Epstein Death 
Dear 
This email concerns the investigation into the death of Jeffrey Epstein in 
the MCC. We realize that it is unlikely your 
office is involved, but we 
> 
USANYE) 
;'Jill Shellow' 
EFTA00018957

thought that we should inform the government of the following so you can 
take whatever action you believe is appropriate. 
Jhonny 
Contreras was recently returned to the SHU in the MCC. At the 
time of Mr. Epstein's death, it is my understanding that Mr. Contreras was 
housed 
in a cell on the same tier and across the hall from Mr. Epstein's 
cell. Mr. Contreras did not see Mr. Epstein hang himself, but he would be 
willing to speak to investigators, in the 
presence of counsel, about his 
observations. 
Please let us know if there is anything further we should do to follow-up. 
Andy 
Andrew G. Patel 
Attorney at Law 
80 Broad Street, Suite 
1900 
New York, 
NY 10004 
Tel 
CONFIDENTIALITY 
NOTICE: 
This e-mail 
message is covered by the Electronic 
Communications Privacy Act, 
18 
U.S.C. 
2510-2521. It is 
legally privileged. The 
information it contains is confidential information and 
is intended 
only for the use of the individual or entity named above. If the reader of this message is not the intended recipient, 
or the employee or agent responsible for delivering it to 
the intended recipient, you are hereby notified that any 
dissemination, distribution or copying of the communication is strictly prohibited. If you have received this e-mail in 
error, please notify me immediately by telephone 
wand 
by return e-mail, 
and delete all copies of the 
message from your computer. Thank you. 
EFTA00018958
